Title: Walk the glorious road shown by the 'Three Constantly Read Articles'
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Cultural Palace of Yancheng (盐城工农兵文化宫革委会)
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社)
Notes: The "Three Constantly Read Articles" (老三篇, lao san pian) were early political essays written by Mao Zedong before 1949. They were entitled In Memory of Norman Bethune, dedicated to Norman Bethune; Serve the People, written in memory of Zhang Side; and The Foolish Old Man Who Removed the Mountains.
